name: Left Is Bugged!?
description:
*****FULL SCREEN MODE TO PLAY

This is my Git Hub 2021 Game Jam Submission! Get the Spider to his web!

I didn't get to work on it nearly as much as I wanted to, but it represents around 30 ish hours of work haha! I created all the assets, and used garage band loops for the music! I hope you enjoy! 

Controls:

Right Arrow to move right

Left Arrow teleports across the middle of the screen

Up Arrow to Jump - Press repeatedly quickly to jump higher

R - Reset Level

Enter - Next level (when a level is finished)
